weeklyDishes.name: Juicy Crab Curry
weeklyDishes.description: Succulent crab pieces simmered in a rich, aromatic gravy with traditional spices. A seafood lover's dream served with fluffy rice.

weeklyDishes.name: Continental Chicken Breast in Cajun Sauce
weeklyDishes.description: Tender chicken breast marinated and grilled to perfection, topped with zesty Cajun sauce and served with roasted vegetables.

weeklyDishes.name: Golden Jumbo Prawns
weeklyDishes.description: Fresh jumbo prawns coated in golden batter and fried to crispy perfection. Served with tangy dipping sauce and fresh herbs.
